sentences.sentence: He looked vacantly out of the window.
One evening she was staring vacantly at an embroidered hanging.
sentences.translation: 一天晚上，她茫然地凝视着一张挂毯。

sentences.sentence: He let go of her hand and watched her float vacantly towards the storeroom door.
sentences.translation: 他让向储藏室门她的手去而且空地看了她的漂流物。
